headline: Union Pacific (UNP): Valuation Insights After Key Labor Agreements and Executive Strategy Updates
summary: Union Pacific (UNP) just checked off two big milestones that should have investors paying extra attention. The company secured ratified labor agreements covering nearly half of its craft workforce and landed interim pay increases for two of its biggest unions. At the same time, Union Pacific’s executive team was front and center at a major industry conference, giving updates on how these labor changes connect to their bigger strategy. These moves could stabilize labor relations, ease future...
